title: Patch will not download: error 004
body: Self explanatory, whenever I attempt to patch the game it will stop and say to restart the client, and then will fail again upon the restart.

replies.body:
The 004 error in the Beta Client is usually an indication that your connection to our patching servers is *poor or unstable*. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety.

Let me know if this caused any change.
I ended up reinstalling and that allowed me to boot up the legacy client again (I made another post about it not opening) and that allowed me to download the patch.
